backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a gamified task/mission system with player profiles, stats, skills, daily tasks, custom tasks, combat mechanics, XP/leveling, inventory, and authorization controls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the mission log history view feature with high confidence, listing related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files describing React components, pages, hooks, and styling for the CRYONEX application with mobile-responsive design and dark fantasy aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with CRYONEX title, Inter font preload, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, profile setup, questionnaire, and navigation between dashboard, missions, mission log, stats, skills, profile, and custom tasks screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyT: Dashboard card displaying AI-recommended daily tasks with completion tracking, showing active and completed tasks with XP and credit rewards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DateCa: Component displaying current date in MM/DD/YY format with calendar icon and accent styling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/RealTi: Component displaying real-time clock in HH:MM:SS format with clock icon and primary color styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper with header (logo and login button), sidebar navigation for all app screens including mission log, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/missions/CustomM: Form component for creating custom missions with validation for title, description, XP reward, and coin reward fields. Uses React hooks for state management and mutation hooks for API submission.
frontend/src/components/profile/AccountD: Alert dialog component that warns users about permanent account deletion and lists all data that will be removed. Provides cancel and confirm actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/Personal: Multi-step questionnaire dialog with progress tracking that collects user answers across multiple questions. Features navigation between questions and submits all answers on completion.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Initial profile setup dialog that prompts new users to enter a nickname. Submits the nickname to initialize the user profile.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CustomTask: Form for creating custom tasks with configurable title, points (1-100), and attribute points (1-10). Includes increment/decrement buttons for numeric inputs.

Displays user's custom tasks separated into active and completed sections with loading and error states. Shows task details including XP points and attribute points with toggle completion functionality.
frontend/src/content/copy.ts: Exports a COPY object containing all UI text strings and labels for the application, including authentication, profile setup, personalization questions, dashboard, missions, skills, inventory, and custom tasks sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, automatically recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceDate.ts: Custom React hook that returns the current date in DD/MM/YY format and automatically updates at midnight each day.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider for the application, managing login state, identity persistence, and authentication lifecycle with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend data operations including user profiles, questionnaires, daily tasks, missions, skills, inventory, and custom tasks with mutation handling and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useRealTimeClock.ts: Custom React hook that returns the current time in HH:MM:SS format (24-hour) and updates every second.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes featuring sci-fi metallic aesthetics with cyan/green accents, plus background image styling and semi-transparent overlay classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CustomTasksPage.tsx: Renders the custom tasks page with a header, task creation form card, and task list component using semi-transparent dark styling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying user profile stats (level, XP, coins, energy), a hero banner with real-time clock and calendar, and a daily tasks section with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, login button, and feature cards showcasing the gamified task management system with blockchain security.
frontend/src/pages/MissionLogPage.tsx: Mission log page showing today's progress summary including completed tasks/missions count and total XP/coins earned today.
frontend/src/pages/MissionsPage.tsx: Missions page displaying daily, repeatable, and custom user missions with completion status tracking, custom mission creation form, and mission deletion functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Profile settings page allowing users to view stats, edit username, logout, and delete their account with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: React component that displays a categorized skill tree with unlock functionality, organizing skills into physical, mental, social, creative, financial, health, learning, and personal care categories with icons and filtering.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: React component for allocating unspent stat points to user attributes, featuring increment/decrement controls, pending allocation preview, and batch submission of stat changes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (cyber/neon theme with OKLCH colors), typography, animations, and design tokens for the application's UI system.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests for automated daily task generation and mission log entries at midnight, with AI-driven task recommendations based on user patterns.
